# marimo-cloud

Cloud CLI for [marimo](http://marimo.io/).

## Installation

```sh
pip install marimo-cloud
```

This installs a CLI tool called `marimo-cloud` (which is also aliased to
`mcloud`, for short).

## Usage

```sh
❯ marimo-cloud --help
╭─ Commands ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╮
│ login                                                                                │
│ logout                                                                               │
│ publish                                                                              │
│ version                                                                              │
╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
```
